title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: June 17, 2022, 07:36:25 PMLast edit: June 18, 2022, 08:57:18 PM by ZipReg
content: Greetings everyone, I hope you're all doing well! Today I have up for auction a custom made CoolStorage.org display piece!I call this one "Fiat Royal Flush" as in FLUSH that fiat! "FIAT ROYAL FLUSH" LOADED Display w/COAReady to hang on the wall or place on displayFiat Royal Flush - Features 24k gold plated"Royal Flush" poker hand along with(1) 2017 Satori Coin #039267, and (4) 2017 Supreme BTC chips in an8x10 matte black wooden framed glass display piece.Starting bid: 0.01BTCBid Increments: 0.001BTCEnd date and time:  Tuesday, June 21st. 2022 at 8pm EST. Countdown TimerShipping: Actual cost paid by winner. Any Import/VAT taxes are to be paid by winner.Sniping: Any bid made within the last 15 minutes of the auctionwill extend the auction 15 minutes, any additional bid within thatextended time shall further extend the auction 15 minutes pastthe time of the last bid until a winner is declared.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude any bidder at my sole discretion. Payment: Will PM winner with payment detailsThank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: This ends tomorrow bump! I think I neglected to mention in OP that this piece includes one of the more rare 2017 post fork satori coins. Thanks!
